review: Great device for the TV. Of course there could be some improvements to it but I would definitely buy it again. One of the main reasons I bought it was the ability for an app like VLC to play movies from USB stick and I can verify that it works. Just make sure you format correctly and keep files below 4gb.
author: NW

review: Loved it so much I bought another one!!! I even saved $50 a month on my Directv bill every month. I haven't "cut the cord" yet but if all goes as well as it has been I will in probably the next 6 months. I am waiting to install my HD Antenna from Amazon on one of the TV's first. Set up and installation is an absolute breeze. It's very small in size - much smaller than my Directv receiver - and doesn't look obtrusive. You can even mount it on the back of your TV if you wanted. Highly recommend this to anyone - and have!
